# creatorAttribute

**Type Property**

An optional text string containing the name of the application that created the document content.

## Declaration

```swift
static let creatorAttribute: PDFDocumentAttribute
```

## Getting Document Attributes

- **authorAttribute**: An optional text string containing the name of the author of the document.
- **creationDateAttribute**: An optional text string containing the document’s creation date.
- **keywordsAttribute**: An optional array of text strings containing keywords for the document.
- **modificationDateAttribute**: An optional text string containing the document’s last-modified date.
- **producerAttribute**: An optional text string containing the name of the application that produced the PDF data for the document.
- **subjectAttribute**: An optional text string containing a description of the subject of the document.
- **titleAttribute**: An optional text string containing the title of the document.
